Name: Sally
Description: Defeat Sally, a monster that spawns in Croatoa, twice

Name: Babbage
Description: Defeat Babbage, a monster that spawns in Boomtown or in an ambush in the Synapse Task Force

Name: Lusca
Description: Defeat Lusca, a monster that spawns in Independence Port

Name: Jack in irons
Description: Defeat Jack in Irons, a monster that spawns in Croatoa

Name: Ghost of Scrapyard
Description: Defeat the Ghost of Scrapyard, a monster that spawns in Sharkhead Isle

Name: Caleb
Description: Defeat Caleb, a monster that spawns in Nerva Archipelago

Name: Adamastor
Description: Defeat Adamastor, a monster who can be summoned in Echo: Dark Astoria

Name: Kronos Class Titan
Description: Defeat Kronos Class Titan, a monster in an ambush in a Crimson mission

Name: U'Kon Gr'ai
Description: Defeat the Rikti Master at Arms U'Kon Gr'ai 10 times during Rikti Ship Raids

Name: Eochai
Description: Defeat Eochai, a monster that spawns in Croatoa

Name: Deathsurge
Description: Defeat Deathsurge, a monster that spawns in Cap au Diable

Name: Jurasssik
Description: Defeat Jurassik, a monster that spawns in Crey's Folly

Name: Kraken
Description: Defeat the Kraken, a monster that spawns in Perez Park

Name: Goliath War Walker
Description: Defeat the Council War Walker in Boomtown

Name: Paladin
Description: Prevent the construction of Paladin, a monster that spawns in Kings Row

Name: Winter Lord
Description: Defeat the Winter Lord, a monster that spawns during the winter event

Name: Arachnos Flier
Description: Defeat the Arachnos Flier in Grandville
